subject: Economy
topic: Bhartiya Arthvyavastha ka Swaroop aur Vikas
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की अधिकारी भूमिका क्या है?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan. In Rajasthan, most of the population speaks Hindi as their mother tongue.
